description: An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one is completely unreadable.
//: We are NOT adding *those* armbands. You ought to be ashamed of yourself.

variants.description: An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for LGBTQA+ pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for lesbian pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for bisexual pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for transgender pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for asexual pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for aromantic pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for pansexual pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for genderqueer pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for gender-fluid pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for agender pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for non-binary pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for intersex pride.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for polysexual pride.

An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one is actually an absolutely hideous necktie. Putting it around your arm feels like a tourniquet, & a voice in the very back of your mine yells "BRATAAN!"
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for Communism. You should wear it, comerade.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for unionization of coal mines. You ain't a scab, are ye?.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one advocates for unionization of workplaces. After all, Joe Hill never died.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one brings out the patriotism in you.
An armband that can be worn by simply tying it on, this one is of the Greek flag. Κρεμάσαμε τον σπαγγετοφάγο!

description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, this one is completely unreadable.
//: We are NOT adding *that* kind of art. You ought to be ashamed of yourself.

variants.name: Pride flag Back Mural
variants.description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, this one is of the LGBTQA+ flag.

variants.name: American Back Mural
variants.description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, this one is of the American flag. Wear it with pride.

variants.name: Catholic Back Mural
variants.description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, this one is of anCatholic mural. Hopefully the pope is alive.

variants.name: Protestant Back Mural
variants.description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, this one is of a Protestant mural. Maybe Martin Luther's back up?

variants.name: Orthodox Back Mural
variants.description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, this one is of an Orthodox mural. The Patriach might still be kickin' around.

variants.name: Elysium Back Mural
variants.description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, it reads "UN JOUR JE SERAI DE RETOUR PRÈS DE TOI".

variants.name: Volition Back Mural
variants.description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, it shows a black, gray, & purple artwork of some sort of head that turns into a crown at the top. Writing on the bottom reads "The road to healing is going to be a long one. Stay the course, you will make it someday. Just remember that you've made it this far, & it's just a bit farther now". It makes you feel better, somehow.

variants.name: Kitsuragi Back Mural
variants.description: A mural that can be material that can be stitched onto a jacket, it shows art of a thin, vaguely asian man, wearing a bomber jacket & glasses. There's a sort of halo around his head, & in the back of your mind, if the skies came crashing down, & the whole wasteland descended upon you, this man would hurl himself in death's way to save you. You are sure of this--But why?
